explains: adj. 学院间的；大学间的

sentences.en: He is a staunch supporter of amateurism in intercollegiate athletics.
sentences.cn: 他坚决支持把学院之间的体育活动业余化。

sentences.en: We met in the final of the next big intercollegiate tournament, and though I had an early lead, he won in three sets.
sentences.cn: 我们在后来的校际锦标赛的决赛中相遇，尽管我先赢一盘，他赢下了后面的三盘。

sentences.en: Columbia University sponsors 29 intercollegiate teams competing in the Ivy League in NCAA Division I (I-AA for football).
sentences.cn: 哥伦比亚大学支持29只校际运动队参加属于NCAA第一级的常春藤联盟比赛。
